# Taxonomic Classification

```{bash}
kraken2 --db kraken_db --report report.txt --output kraken_output.txt non_host.fastq
```

## Visualization

```{bash}
ktImportTaxonomy -o krona_report.html report.txt
```

## Metagenomics Automation

```{bash}
snakemake --cores 4
```

# Generating a Consensus Sequence

Use minimap2 and samtools for alignment and variant calling.

## Consensus Visualization

Visual inspection using IGV or bam-readcount.

## Phylodynamics

Run tree inference with tools like IQ-TREE or TreeTime, then visualize with Auspice or iTOL.
